description: I. Letter dated 03/07/2008 from Ken Boston, Chief Executive of the QCA, to Jim Knight MP regarding the delay in delivery of results of the national curriculum tests. 2 p. II. Letter dated 03/07/2008 from Jim Knight MP to Ken Boston, replying to above letter. 1 p. III. Letter dated 04/07/2008 from Ed Balls MP to Barry Sheerman MP regarding the delay in release of Key Stage 2 and 3 national curriculum test results to schools. 2 p.
department: Qualifications and Curriculum Authority Dept for Children Schools and Families
